p: A summary of statistical analyses of the best models for all 65 provinces is shown in Tables 1 and 2. Significant values of the GLM models of the top mortality rate provinces in 2013 (Chiang Rai, Mae Hong Son, Chiang Mai, Phuket, Phang Nga, Krabi, Lampang, Loei, Khon Kean, Songkhla, Nakhon Phanom, and Bangkok) are shown in Tables 3 and 4.
